title: Hotkeys randomly not work
body:
I can type fine in chat but certain keys will not respond. I Googled around and said to delete the input.ini file in the directory of League, and into Config. This is extremely frustrating for both me and my teammates.

To no avail nothing is working. Tips?

replies.body:
Ahhhh you might not be doing that config reset in the right order for it to stick possibly. Run through these steps in order and it should work, but definitely hit me back up if it doesn't work still!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

MY BRO BROPORO! That's a cute name I love it!

Anyways, yeah I got it to work and stuff and I appreciate it and you're def right. Things are working good. I do have a few questions though..

Why does this occur and how do I prevent it from happening in the future? Seems like it happens randomly? Or am I doing something? Lol.

Those settings are actually saved on the servers but stored locally when you're playing. Sometimes I think the client just doesn't grab them or save them back correctly or something weird like that.
